version_description:
We've fixed bugs and improved performance. Let us know what you think!

Two pro tips:
• You can search and share contacts without opening the contacts app. Switch on “contacts search” in Gboard search settings to enable. 
• You can move your cursor easily by sliding your finger on the space bar. Give it a try.

Gboard is now available globally in English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese (Brazil and Portugal) and Spanish (Spain). We’ve also added some new features:
• Smart GIF suggestions — joining text, emoji, and search suggestions, you’ll see GIF suggestions while typing. Try typing “wow!” to see it in action
• Personalize the look of Gboard — now you can choose a darker keyboard or add your own image to use as the background of Gboard. Open the Gboard app and tap “Theme” to get started

• New themes—check out some of the breathtaking landscape themes we’ve added!
• 3D Touch—you can now move your cursor by hard pressing and sliding your finger anywhere on the keyboard
• New iOS 10 Emojis—Gboard has been updated with the new iOS 10 emojis
• Search and share contacts—ever had someone ask you to share a phone number? With Gboard, you can easily search and share your contacts without leaving your conversation. To get started, open the app, tap “search settings” and turn “Contacts search” on.

1.2.1
• Bug fixes and performances improvements

1.2.0
• New themes—check out some of the breathtaking landscape themes we’ve added!
• 3D Touch—you can now move your cursor by hard pressing and sliding your finger anywhere on the keyboard
• New iOS 10 Emojis—Gboard has been updated with the new iOS 10 emojis
• Search and share contacts—ever had someone ask you to share a phone number? With Gboard, you can easily search and share your contacts without leaving your conversation. To get started, open the app, tap “search settings” and turn “Contacts search” on.

• Bug fixes and performances improvements

1.2.0
• New themes—check out some of the breathtaking landscape themes we’ve added!
• 3D Touch—you can now move your cursor by hard pressing and sliding your finger anywhere on the keyboard
• New iOS 10 Emojis—Gboard has been updated with the new iOS 10 emojis
• Search and share contacts—ever had someone ask you to share a phone number? With Gboard, you can easily search and share your contacts without leaving your conversation. To get started, open the app, tap “search settings” and turn “Contacts search” on.

• Bug fixes and performances improvements

1.2.0
• New themes—check out some of the breathtaking landscape themes we’ve added!
• 3D Touch—you can now move your cursor by hard pressing and sliding your finger anywhere on the keyboard
• New iOS 10 Emojis—Gboard has been updated with the new iOS 10 emojis
• Search and share contacts—ever had someone ask you to share a phone number? With Gboard, you can easily search and share your contacts without leaving your conversation. To get started, open the app, tap “search settings” and turn “Contacts search” on.

• 15 new languages — Gboard now works in Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Polish, Romanian, Swedish, Catalan, Hungarian, Malay, Russian, Latin American Spanish, and Turkish
• Voice typing — Just tap the mic button to dictate messages on the go
• Google Doodles —  Get fun updates to the Google logo celebrating special dates throughout the year, like holidays, events, and famous birthdays. Just tap the “G” button whenever it animates to see that day’s Doodle. 
• New Emoji — Gboard is now updated with the latest iOS 10 emoji

1.3.1 
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

1.3.0
• 15 new languages — Gboard now works in Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Polish, Romanian, Swedish, Catalan, Hungarian, Malay, Russian, Latin American Spanish, and Turkish
• Voice typing — Just long press on the space bar to dictate messages on the go
• Google Doodles —  Get fun updates to the Google logo celebrating special dates throughout the year, like holidays, events, and famous birthdays. Just tap the “G” button whenever it animates to see that day’s Doodle. 
• New Emoji — Gboard is now updated with the latest iOS 10 emoji

• Gboard now supports Simplified Chinese with 4 layouts — including Pinyin (QWERTY and 9 key), Wubi, and Stroke
• Improvements to voice input functionality. 
• Bug fixes and performance improvements. 

We are always working to make the app faster and more stable. If you are enjoying the app, please consider leaving a review or rating!

• Gboard now supports Simplified Chinese with 4 layouts — including Pinyin (QWERTY and 9 key), Wubi, and Stroke
• Improvements to voice input functionality. 
• Bug fixes and performance improvements. 

We are always working to make the app faster and more stable. If you are enjoying the app, please consider leaving a review or rating!
• Bug fixes and stability improvements
• Fixed user dictionary bug

• Gboard now works in Vietnamese. 
• With new typing suggestions, Gboard can do math and unit conversions for you. Try typing 91+25 or 5 kg to see it in action!
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Gboard now supports Norwegian!
• Gboard now supports Arabic, Persian, and Hebrew!

• Now with a tap of the G button, you’ll have access to both Maps and YouTube, making it easier than ever to share location and video content.
• The new Ink feature lets you draw and share your creations right from your keyboard. To start drawing, just tap on the emoji button and then the pen icon.

* Make your own GIFs by tapping on the Emoji key, then the GIF tab and finally Make a GIF.  Record your GIF, draw on it, add emojis, and then share it with your friends!
* Persian support has been added to the iPad.
* Fixed disappearing voice input issue.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Use Gboard with one hand! -- we've added one-handed mode to make it easier than ever to text and search when you're on-the-go! To try it, long-press on the globe icon and tap one-handed mode. 
Gboard now supports Japanese - including 12 keys, QWERTY, and Godan layouts.

We’ve fixed the issue that prevented auto-correction and glide-typing 
We’ve added an emoji shortcut!  To more easily access GIFs and Ink, just long press on the emoji icon and toggle to the GIF or pen icon  
Other bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Gboard now supports Traditional Chinese!
The default Gboard theme will automatically darken in dark-mode apps.
Gboard now supports Korean!
Gboard now supports Korean!

In this version we have:

● Long press misspelled suggestions to remove them from the dictionary.
● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ Hindi
        ○ Hindi (Transliteration)
        ○ Hinglish

Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and, of course, delivering cool new features.

In this version, we have:

- Still using text emoticons like :) instead of emojis? Type your text emoticon like you're used to and Gboard will suggest an appropriate emoji!

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:

- Create hyperlapsed GIFs! Tap on the camera icon, then switch the camera mode to "Fast-Forward" to - create mind-bending sped up GIFs.
- Introducing Korean as a new language to Gboard!
- Cycle through your languages whilst staying within Gboard! Go to Gboard -> Settings -> Keyboard settings and enable "Switch through Gboard languages"
- Updated to look awesome on your new iPhone X!
- Also updated to look awesome in dark mode when an app calls for it.
- Want to dismiss the G bubble? Swipe it away!
Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and, of course, delivering cool new features.

Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and, of course, delivering cool new features.
 
In this version, we have:
 
​• ​We've added a new feature to the MAKE A GIF flow: Now you can move and pin your drawings around, just like you could for text! 
​•​ Searching for the perfect emoji or GIF has now gotten (even) easier! Pressing the universal search icon will bring up a textfield where search is done across both emojis and GIFs. 
​•​ Want to share the most popular GIFs? Check out the trending GIF category. 
 
In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:
 
​•​ Still using text emoticons like :) instead of emojis? Type like you're used to doing but tap an emoji suggestion instead! 
​•​ Create hyperlapsed GIFs! Tap on the camera icon, then switch the camera mode to "Fast-Forward" to create mind-bending sped up GIFs. 
​•​ Introducing Korean as a new language to Gboard! 
​•​ Cycle through your languages while staying within Gboard! Go to Gboard -> Settings -> Keyboard settings and enable "Switch through Gboard languages" 
​•​ Updated to look awesome on your new iPhone X! 
​•​ Also updated to look awesome in dark mode when an app calls for it. 
​•​ Want to dismiss the G bubble? Swipe it away!

Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and,
of course, delivering cool new features.

In this version, we have:

● Added support for the following languages:
    ○ Latvian
    ○ Indonesian
    ○ Slovenian
    ○ Slovak
    ○ Ukrainian
    ○ Bulgarian
    ○ Serbian
    ○ Arabic (Morocco)
    ○ Lithuanian
    ○ French (Canada)
    ○ Italian (Switzerland)
    ○ Spanish (US)

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:

● A new feature to the MAKE A GIF flow: Now you can move and pin your drawings around, just like you could
for text!
● Searching for the perfect emoji or GIF has now gotten (even) easier! Pressing the universal search icon will
bring up a textfield where search is done across both emojis and GIFs.
● Want to share the most popular GIFs? Check out the trending GIF category.

In this version we have:

● Added the QWERTZ keyboard layout for Czech.
● Added support for the following languages:
     ○ French (Belgium)
     ○ French (Switzerland)
     ○ German (Switzerland)
     ○ Icelandic
     ○ Macedonian
     ○ Spanish (Latin America)
     ○ Swahili

In this version we have:

● Swipe up or long press on the top row to quickly type a number
● Make conversations more fun with emoticons! (ò_ó )  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ Azerbaijani
        ○ Maltese
        ○ Serbian (Latin)

In this version we have:

● Long press misspelled suggestions to remove them from the dictionary.
● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ Hindi
        ○ Hindi (Transliteration)
        ○ Hinglish

In this version, we have:
 
● Stickers! You can share awesome stickers straight from Gboard!
● Camera effects for MAKE A GIF! There are six new effects you can choose from -- go to the camera by tapping on the camera icon and tap the new camera effects button to choose an effect to create your GIF with.

In this version, we have:

● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ English (South Africa)
        ○ English (Nigeria)
        ○ English (Kenya)
        ○ English (Philippines)
        ○ Belarusian
        ○ Welsh
        ○ Afrikaans

In this version, we have:
    ● Added three fun new camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
    ● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ Hausa

In this version, we have:
● Morse keyboard.
● Dvorak and Colemak layouts for English keyboards.

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:
●  Dvorak and Colemak layouts for the English keyboard.
●  Morse keyboard.
●  Added several new fun camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
●  Added support for the following languages:
        ○  Hausa
        ○  Afrikaans

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:
●  Dvorak and Colemak layouts for the English keyboard.
●  Morse keyboard.
●  Added several new fun camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
●  Added support for the following languages:
        ○  Hausa
        ○  Afrikaans

In this version, we have:
● Your minis: Stickers based on you. Create and customize minis inspired by your photos, and share them in any app.
● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ Estonian
        ○ Zulu

In this version, we have:

● You can now type in multiple languages without having to change the language! Just add the languages you
want via the Gboard app then start typing or swiping!
*Not all languages are supported.
● Improved voice typing experience.
● Added new fun camera effects for MAKE A GIF!


In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:

● Your minis: Stickers based on you. Create and customize minis inspired by your photos, and share them in
any app.
● Dvorak and Colemak layouts for the English keyboard.
● Morse keyboard.
● Added support for the following languages:
        ○ Estonian
        ○ Zulu

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:

• Your minis: Stickers based on you. Create and customize minis inspired by your photos, and share them in any app.
• You can now type in multiple languages without having to change the language! Just add the languages that you want via the Gboard app, then start typing or swiping!
*Not all languages are supported.
• Improved voice typing experience.
• Added new fun camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
• Dvorak and Colemak layouts for the English keyboard.
• Morse keyboard.

In this version we have:
• Fixes for voice input, Make-A-GIF and a few other features.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Fixes for voice input, Make-A-GIF and a few other features.

In this version we have:
• Revamped themes: Gboard custom themes are better than ever with many new customization options! Change everything from background color to glide trail thickness. Plus, new beautiful gradient themes for you to pick from!
* Not all theme options are applicable for some Chinese and Japanese keyboard layouts.
 
In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:
• Your minis: Stickers based on you. Create and customize minis inspired by your photos, and share them in any app.
• You can now type in multiple languages without having to change the language! Just add the languages you want via the Gboard app then start typing or swiping!
*Not all languages are supported.
• Improved voice typing experience.
• Language support for Thai, Khmer, Lao and Mongolian.
